mapper.update: UPDATE transaction SET Transaction_Date=#{transactionDate}, Transaction_Type=#{transactionType}, Fee_Name=#{feeName}, Transaction_Number=#{transactionNumber}, Details=#{details}, Seller_SKU=#{sellerSku}, Lazada_SKU=#{lazadaSku}, Amount=#{amount}, VAT_in_Amount=#{vatInAmount}, WHT_Amount=#{whtAmount}, WHT_included_in_Amount=#{whtIncludedInAmount}, Statement=#{statement}, Paid_Status=#{paidStatus}, Order_No=#{orderNo}, Order_Item_No=#{orderItemNo}, Order_Item_Status=#{orderItemStatus}, Shipping_Provider=#{shippingProvider}, Shipping_Speed=#{shippingSpeed}, Shipment_Type=#{shipmentType}, Reference=#{reference}, Comment=#{comment}, PaymentRefId=#{paymentrefid}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE Order_No=#{orderNo} AND Transaction_Date=#{transactionDate} AND Transaction_Type=#{transactionType} AND Transaction_Number=#{transactionNumber} AND Seller_SKU=#{sellerSku} AND Lazada_SKU=#{lazadaSku}
